issue.title: [R] Use unary negative kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12575](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12575). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Followup to ARROW-11950. Grep for that issue number in the r directory to see where to make changes. https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10113/files#diff-ce5b94577014735990903d3d03bd4ea4b8c8e6d32f5227592e60b7dd6a912d59 shows what the new compute function is called.

comments.body:
